findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges that can be exploited even after ownership renouncement, including changing tax and liquidity fee, maximum transaction amount, excluding from fees, pausing/unpausing transactions, setting trading time, restrictions amount, whitelisting accounts, and locking/unlocking.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.
